activities: Landmark Discovery is a managed document review and advanced data prioritization provider servicing law firms and corporations.  Landmark Discovery acts as a data processor on behalf of our clients or partners (data controller) when we process or review personal information as part of our legal support services.  Landmark Discovery does not actively collect personal information from individuals in the EU and acts per the instructions of our clients in a legal support manner on the provided data.  Landmark Discovery recognizes the importance of privacy to our clients and partners in which we strive to safeguard the security and confidentiality of any and all personal information provided to us.
